welcome_message_body: "Welcome to La Calamine, Belgium! Get ready to be charmed by our picturesque town known for its historic buildings and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that La Calamine has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
